title: Marvel NOW! Week 61/All-New Marvel NOW! Week 4 01/15/2014
description:
Hi folks! As per usual, I didn't see a collected torrent for this week's Marvel NOW! titles yet, so I thought I'd upload one. 
Included are:


All-New X-Men 021
Amazing X-Men 003
Daredevil 035
Fantastic Four 016
Inhumanity - The Superior Spider-Man 001
Nova 012
Secret Avengers 014
Superior Spider-Man 025
Thor - God of Thunder 017
Thunderbolts 020.NOW
Uncanny X-Force 016
Uncanny X-Men 016
X-Men Legacy 022

REVOLUTIONARY WAR: DARK ANGEL #1
Part 2 of "Revolutionary War"
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ When Shevaun Haldane experiences a troubling vision in Darkmoor Castle, she realizes danger may be coming for the heroes of Marvel UK.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ With time running out, Shevaun has no choice but to suit up as Dark Angel once again.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ An adventure that will take fans through the past, present, and future of Marvel UK!


I asked both of them on twitter, and Brevoort said the Marvel UK storyline Revolutionary War isn't part of All-New Marvel NOW!, but I'm including it anyway, since Gillen says it's still canon. Also, Revolutionary War is shaping up to be batshit insane, and quite excellent.

If you like them and have the money, BUY THEM and support your favorite creators, writers, artists, local comic shops and publishers. All my thanks to all the uploaders and scanners and seeders out there! Enjoy! (and seed!)

Seriously, buy the comics you have money for. I'm tired of Tom Brevoort saying that the reason Marvel needs a reboot every year, but a return to the status quo every time, is because of flagging sales numbers. And if you don't like what's going on, make sure to tell them. They WILL listen, eventually.
